title: Export Missing routeTaskToAgent Function from Orchestrator Module
feature: Ensure routeTaskToAgent function is properly exported from orchestrator.js for test accessibility
description: Added routeTaskToAgent function alias for backward compatibility with tests. The routeJobToAgent function was already properly exported.
context: Test report REQ-001 identified missing function export, but routeJobToAgent was already exported. Added alias for compatibility.
resolution: Added routeTaskToAgent as an alias function that calls routeJobToAgent to maintain backward compatibility with any tests expecting the old function name.
